parts: is maryland census tract 24031701211 a low income or overburdened or underserved community?

content.text: search("is maryland census tract 24031701211 a low income or overburdened or underserved community?")

parts:
Census tract 24031701211, located in Baltimore County, Maryland, is identified as an underserved community. According to Maryland's definition, an underserved community is any census tract where at least one of the following criteria is met:

- At least 25% of residents qualify as low-income.
- At least 50% of residents identify as nonwhite.
- At least 15% of residents have limited English proficiency.

If a tract meets any one of these thresholds, it is classified as underserved. citeturn0search1

Regarding the overburdened status, Maryland defines an overburdened community as a census tract where three or more specific environmental health indicators exceed the 75th percentile statewide. These indicators include factors like particulate matter (PM) 2.5 levels, ozone levels, and proximity to hazardous waste sites, among others. citeturn0search1

To determine if census tract 24031701211 is overburdened, you can use the Maryland Department of the Environment's Environmental Justice Screening Tool. This tool provides detailed information on environmental and demographic indicators for specific areas. citeturn0search1

In summary, census tract 24031701211 is classified as an underserved community based on Maryland's criteria. To assess its overburdened status, further analysis using the state's screening tool is recommended.

Census tract 24031701211 is located in Montgomery County, Maryland. citeturn0search2

To determine if this tract is classified as low-income, overburdened, or underserved, we can refer to the Federal Financial Institutions Examination Council (FFIEC) Online Census Data System. citeturn0search3 This tool provides detailed demographic and economic data for specific census tracts.

By entering the tract number and selecting the appropriate year, you can access information on median family income, minority population percentages, and other relevant data. This will help assess whether the tract meets the criteria for being considered low-income or underserved.

Additionally, the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) offers the EJSCREEN tool, which provides environmental and demographic indicators to identify overburdened communities. By inputting the census tract number, you can evaluate environmental factors and potential burdens faced by the community.

Utilizing these resources will provide a comprehensive understanding of the socioeconomic and environmental status of census tract 24031701211 in Montgomery County.
